item.title: Internet layer
item.description: The second layer in the [[technology/networking/internet-protocol-suite|internet protocol suite]]. Mainly responsible for packet forwarding, including routing through intermediate routers. Several protocols employed in the internet layer include:

item.title: Internet Protocol address
item.description: An identifier for a network device typically assigned by another more prominent network device that identifies the device in the network using the [[technology/networking/internet-protocol|internet protocol]].
